title: FontLab menues looking strange.
content:
My “CTRL-click” panel looks like this, anyone knows why? I guess it started looking like that after installing some scripts.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080112153510im_/http:/typophile.com/files/macropanel_5806.png)

Thanks in advance.

Göran

 [‹ OpenType Resources (link collection)](http://web.archive.org/web/20080112153510/http:/typophile.com/node/39375 "Go to previous forum topic") [Managing Additional Diacritics in an FL Typeface ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080112153510/http:/typophile.com/node/39377 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Goran Soderstrom

comments.content: And all the “macro” menues are empty, except one.
go to (your user folder)/Library/Application Support/FontLab/Studio 5/Workspaces/ and delete CurrentWorkspace.rc. in my experience this file is as fragile and corruptible as a two-year-old child.
